Abstract: quantum computes and cars smarter than you are**Scientists at Bell Laboratories set their sights on developing ever more capable communications systems as easy to use as they are powerful, making technology sufficiently advanced that it becomes transparent; photo (M)
Snippet: quantum computes and cars smarter than you are**Scientists at Bell Laboratories set their sights on developing ever more capable communications systems as easy to use as they are powerful, making technology sufficiently advanced that it becomes tr...
LeadParagraph: IN the 20th century, scientists at Bell Laboratories invented modern marvels like the transistor and the laser, but that is ancient history to the engineers working there today for Lucent Technologies Inc. In fact, they do not really have much use for the present.

Headline.Main: Giving the Globe A Networked Skin
Headline.Kicker: VISIONS: TECHNOLOGY: QUANTUM COMPUTERS AND CARS SMARTER THAN YOU ARE
